ButtonControl, CheckedControl, ColorControl, CompositeContourControl, ControlCheckbox, ControlCheckboxButton, ControlColorScale, ControlList, ControlSlider, CursorOutputControl, FieldEntryControl, FormatControl, FrameController, LabelCombobox, PanViewControl, RangeControl, SceneController, SpinnerControl, TabbedViewControl, ViewControlMaker
public abstract class ViewControl
extends ActiveJPanel
implements IViewControl

Any class that extends this class will be used to adjust settings on the IViewComponent.

Field Detail

TITLE

public static final java.lang.String TITLE
"Title" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the title of this view control. This title is usually displayed via a titled border. This ObjectState key references a String.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SHARED_KEY

public static final java.lang.String SHARED_KEY
"Shared Key" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information about the shared key associated with this view control. This ObjectState key references a String.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DISPLAY_BORDER

public static final java.lang.String DISPLAY_BORDER
"Display Border" - This constant String is a key for referencing the state information that describes if this ViewControl's border is visible or not. The value that this key references is a Boolean.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

Method Detail

getObjectState

public ObjectState getObjectState(boolean isDefault)
This method will get the current values of the state variables for this object. These variables will be wrapped in an ObjectState.

Specified by:
getObjectState in interface IPreserveState
Specified by:
getObjectState in interface IViewControl
Parameters:
isDefault - Should selective state be returned, that used to store user preferences common from project to project?
Returns:
if true, the default state containing user preferences, if false, the entire state, suitable for project specific saves.

getSharedKey

public java.lang.String getSharedKey()
Get the category key associating this control with other controls. This String will be used to "link" controls together.

Specified by:
getSharedKey in interface IViewControl
Returns:
Key used by ControlManager to link controls.

setSharedKey

public void setSharedKey(java.lang.String key)
Set the category key associating this control with other controls. This String will be used to "link" controls together.

Specified by:
setSharedKey in interface IViewControl
Parameters:
key - The key used by the ControlManager to link this control with other similar controls.

copy

public abstract ViewControl copy()
This method will make an exact copy of the control.

Returns:
A new, identical instance of the control.

setBorderVisible

public void setBorderVisible(boolean isVisible)
Since the ViewControl class automatically displays a border, use this to hide the border.

Parameters:
isVisible - If true, display titled border, else hide it.
